mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: This module displays a Username and Password login form. It also displays a link to retrieve a forgotten password. If user registration is enabled, (refer to the Configuration settings), then another link will be shown to invite users to self-register. We've has also hacked out the tables and made it thin and horizontal.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: login
param.label: Login Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the login redirect to after login, if let blank will load front page

param.name: logout
param.label: Logout Redirection URL
param.description: What page will the login redirect to after login, if let blank will load front page

param.name: login_message
param.label: Login Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Login Success

param.name: logout_message
param.label: Logout Message
param.description: Show/Hide the javascript Pop-up indicating Logout Success
